channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Womanizer Coupons: Save 15% in December
item.description: Enjoy discounts on Duo Premium and more sex toys with our Womanizer coupon codes.

item.title: Western Digital Promo Code: 10% Off
item.description: Get 10% off your first order at Western Digital when you register your email.

item.title: Subtle releases ear buds with its noise cancelation models
item.description: Subtle's new $199 earbuds will also let you dictate in any app on desktop or phone

item.title: AirDoctor Coupon Codes: 40% Off | January 2026
item.description: Save up to $400 on top air purifiers and filters with verified AirDoctor promo codes and special offers for January 2026.

item.title: 8 WhatsApp Features to Boost Your Security and Privacy
item.description: Meta’s end-to-end encrypted messaging app is used by billions of people. Here’s how to make sure you’re one of the most locked-down ones out there.

item.title: You’ve Got a Public Reddit Profile. Here’s How to Curate It
item.description: Make your profile page look good—and make sure you’re not sharing more than you want to.

item.title: California residents can use new tool to demand brokers delete their personal data
item.description: A new tool should make it easier for California residents to limit data brokers’ ability to store and sell their personal information.

item.title: Bitfinex hacker Ilya Lichtenstein credits Trump for early release from prison

item.title: Tech billionaires cashed out $16 billion in 2025 as stocks soared
item.description: Jeff Bezos led the way. The Amazon founder sold 25 million shares for $5.7 billion in June and July, right around the time he was getting hitched to L...

item.title: India orders Musk’s X to fix Grok over ‘obscene’ AI content
item.description: India's IT ministry has given X 72 hours to submit an action-taken report.
